name: The Companions
description: The Companions are the warriors guild of Skyrim. Founded by Ysgramor, they are the most renowned group of mercenaries and warriors in the province. The Circle, the inner leadership, harbors a dark secret - they are werewolves.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cc6600%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚öîÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Thieves Guild
description: The Thieves Guild is a criminal organization operating in the shadows of Skyrim's cities. Once a powerful force, the Guild has fallen on hard times due to a mysterious curse. Members follow the code of no killing during heists.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23333333%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüóùÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: College of Winterhold
description: The College of Winterhold is the premier institution for magical learning in Skyrim. Despite being mistrusted by Nords, it stands as a beacon of arcane knowledge. The College guards powerful artifacts and ancient secrets.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2399ccff%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22%23003366%22%3EüîÆ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Dark Brotherhood
description: The Dark Brotherhood is a guild of assassins shrouded in shadow and mystery. They worship the Dread Father Sithis and follow the commands of the Night Mother. Members perform the Black Sacrament to summon contracts.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23660000%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüó°Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: The Greybeards
description: The Greybeards are an ancient and honored order that follow the Way of the Voice. They live in absolute silence and contemplation at High Hrothgar. They are the masters of the Thu'um and train the Dragonborn.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cccccc%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22%23333333%22%3E‚õ∞Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: The Blades
description: The Blades were once the protectors of the Emperor and dragon slayers of legend. Now reduced to two members, Delphine and Esbern work to rebuild the order and defeat Alduin. They are sworn enemies of all dragons.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cc9966%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3Eüó°Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
